context.question: Can this object typically be found in homes?
Is this object commonly found or used outside?
Is this object regularly used in professional settings?
Is this object commonly used in educational settings?
Is this object primarily used for cooking or dining?

property.question: Can this object be easily carried around?
Does this object require electricity to function?
Does this object typically cost a lot of money?
Can this object be found in nature without human modification?

wording.question: Does this word have exactly two syllables?
Does this word begin with a vowel (a,e,i,o,u)?
Does this word end with a consonant?
Does this word contain exactly five letters?
Does this word contain a letter that isn't pronounced?
